context: Could you recommend a book by betty smith?
Have you read A Tree Grows in Brooklyn by Betty Smith? It was released in 1943.
No I have not. Any others?
That is the only book I know by Betty Smith. The Lady in the Lake was also released in 1943.
Can you recommend a similar book?
resp: These Happy Golden Years is a book similar to A Tree Grows in Brooklyn. Would you like more similar books?
